DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see recently develop clinical prediction rule ( CPR ) successfully identify patient neck pain respond rapidly favorably manipulation cervical spine .
DOC.detailed_description: Consenting patient primary complaint neck pain screen contraindication cervical spine manipulation eligible participate study , undergo detailed subjective ( history ) objective ( physical ) examination . At completion examination , assign one two treatment arm - cervical manipulation exercise exercise . They receive 5 treatment session follow 1 month , 3 month 6 month initial visit .
DOC.criteria: Primary complaint mechanical neck pain without unilateral upper extremity symptom ( mechanical neck pain define neck pain/ symptom altered/ affected activity , movement posture ) NDI score least 10 point 50 . Red flag note patient 's Neck Medical Screening Questionnaire ( i.e . tumor , fracture , metabolic disease , Rheumatoid Arthritis , osteoporosis , prolonged history steroid use , etc . ) History whiplash injury within past six week Diagnosis cervical spinal stenosis bilateral upper extremity symptom Evidence central nervous system involvement , include hyperreflexia , sensory disturbance hand , intrinsic muscle waste hand , unsteadiness walking , nystagmus , loss visual acuity , impaired sensation face , alter taste , presence pathological reflex ( i.e . positive Hoffman 's and/or Babinski reflex ) , etc . Two positive neurologic sign consistent nerve root compression , include two following : . Muscle weakness involve major muscle group upper extremity b . Diminished upper extremity muscle stretch reflex ( biceps brachii , Brachioradialis , triceps reflex ) c. Diminished absent sensation pinprick upper extremity dermatome Prior surgery neck thoracic spine Pending legal action regard neck pain Insufficient English language skill complete questionnaire Inability comply treatment followup schedule
